overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a robust social media presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, with a total of 3,580 followers. His content primarily focuses on research and academic topics related to social media, disinformation, and computational methods. Engagement varies across platforms, with the highest interaction observed on LinkedIn.
